subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets fortified their weakened rotation by acquiring Orlando Hernández, the former Yankee known as El Duque, from the Arizona Diamondbacks in exchange for the enigmatic reliever Jorge Julio.
snippet: The Mets fortified their weakened rotation by acquiring Orlando Hernández, the former Yankee known as El Duque, from the Arizona Diamondbacks in exchange for the enigmatic reliever Jorge Julio.
